tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_initiatives (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Initiative (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_supplier_id FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Supplier(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_reduction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    waste_reduction_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_reduction_metric_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    waste_reduction_metric_value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierWasteTracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10, 2),
  tracking_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteReductionSuppliers (
 supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 waste_reduction_initiative TEXT
)
